unnormalised: Criminal kaido, hanv? Odik criminal *bore* bhaxen, hanv chukicho? Mhozo padoshi, Sharmaji, haka CrPC 107 khala notice ailem. Dishta, tachi 5 AM-achi vhoddli bhajan sessions “shantichi bod’dika” korun asa. Hanvem taka sanglam tannem noise pollution-acher add counter-complaint bhorti korunk... sokallchea kauvlleanche add! Adv. Verma case sambhallta, ₹10,000 dor aikunk gheun. Sharmaji sangta to harta zalear, to IPC Section 290-ak dos ditolo ani Goeam vochotolo. Thoinchea 5:00 AM-ak shanti mellovpak subhechha!
normalised: Gunhegari kaido, hã? Gunhegari bore mhonnlear zaata. Mhozo komvo, Sharmaji, taka C-r-P-C ek shunya satachea khala notice ailem. Dista, tachim zorachim bhajanachim sessionam panch vaztam "shanti bhang kortat". Hanvem taka sanglam ki tannem suvera noise pollutionacher ulto complaint bhortolo... sakalleche kavyanche virodant! A-d-v. Verma case sambhallta, rupia dha hazar dor ek aikneak gheta. Sharmaji mhonnta zoxem tanem harle zalear, to I-P-C Section don she ani navad chukto ani Goak vheta. Panch vaztam thõi shanti mellovnk shubhechha!
